root.name: Singstar Legends
root.description: Tracklist Aretha Franklin - Respect Black Sabbath - Paranoid David Bowie - Life On Mars? Dusty Springfield - Son Of A Preacher Man Elton John - Rocket Man Elvis Presley - Blue Suede Shoes Jackie Wilson - Reet Petite The Jackson 5 - I Want You Back John Lennon - Imagine Johnny Cash - Ring Of Fire Lynyrd Skynyrd - Sweet Home Alabama Madonna - Papa Don't Preach Marvin Gaye - I Heard It Through The Grapevine The Monkees - Daydream Believer Nirvana - Smells Like Teen Spirit Pet Shop Boys - Always On My Mind The Police - Roxanne The Righteous Brothers - Unchained Melody Tina Turner - What's Love Got To Do With It? U2 - Vertigo Whitney Houston - Greatest Love Of All United Kingdom Only Songs Barry White - You're The First, The Last, My Everything Blur - Parklife Depeche Mode - Enjoy The Silence Ella Fitzgerald and Louis Armstrong - Let's Call The Whole Thing Off Patsy Cline - Crazy The Rolling Stones - Sympathy For The Devil Roxy Music - Love Is The Drug Sam Cooke - Wonderful World The Smiths - This Charming Man Â Australia Only Songs The Angels - No Secrets The Easybeats - Friday On My Mind Jimmy Barnes - No Second Prize Jimmy Barnes - Working Class Man John Farnham - You're The Voice John Paul Young - Love Is In The Air Midnight Oil - Beds Are Burning Silverchair - Tomorrow
